abstract: A new system that is incompatible with Blu-ray, called HD VMD, for versatile multilayer disc, is trying to find a niche.
snippet: A new system that is incompatible with Blu-ray, called HD VMD, for versatile multilayer disc, is trying to find a niche.
lead_paragraph: No sooner has the battle for the next-generation high definition DVD format ended, with Blu-ray triumphing over HD DVD, than a new contender has emerged.

headline.main: Another DVD Format, but This One Says It’s Cheaper
headline.print_headline: Another DVD Format, but This One Says It’s Cheaper
